name: Sunquick Blackcurrant Concentrate
description: Sunquick Blackcurrant is made from real fruit juice and provide Vitamin C. Sunquick Standard bottle contains 330ml concentrate to make 16 glasses of delicious fruit drinks.  Sunquick is a high quality fruit drink with a refreshing and unique fruit taste. Each bottle of concentrate gives you 40 glasses of delicious fruit drink, making Sunquick perfect for sharing with family and friends. Sunquick is not containing Any artificial colorings, artificial sweeteners or artificial flavorings. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
